text: aur hamane madayan vaalon ke paas unake bhaee shueb ko paigambar bana kar bheja unhonne (apanee qaum se) kaha ai meree qaum khuda kee ibaadat karo usake siva tumhaara koee khuda nahin aur naap aur taul mein koee kamee na kiya karo mai to tum ko aasoodagee (khushahaalee) mein dekh raha hoon (phir ghataane kee kya zarurat hai) aur mai to tum par us din ke azaab se daraata hoon jo (sabako) gher lega
